sentences.sContent: At which point my townsfolk started calling the new Edisonians "dot heads.
sentences.sContent_eng: At which point my townsfolk started calling the new Edisonians "dot heads.
sentences.sCn: 此时我的同乡们开始把这些新来的爱迪生市民叫“点脑壳”。

sentences.sContent: I never thought homely, townsfolk killing Brits could be so hot.
sentences.sContent_eng: I never thought homely, townsfolk killing Brits could be so hot.
sentences.sCn: 我也没想到普通的小市民，杀戮起来可以如此性感。

sentences.sContent: Empty beaches are perfect for strolling and the sociable townsfolk are masters of the art of shooting the breeze.
sentences.sContent_eng: Empty beaches are perfect for strolling and the sociable townsfolk are masters of the art of shooting the breeze.
sentences.sCn: 空旷的海滩非常适合散步，爱好社交的市民都是闲聊的大师。

trans.tranOther: The townsfolk of a town or city are the people who live there
